data.title: Hotels in Derby
data.meta_description: Choose from a range of hotels in Derby. Our lowest rates are only available to Book Directly with us. From booking to bed, rest easy with Premier Inn.
data.text:
Famous for its historic buildings and vibrant nightlife, Derby is a tourist hotspot in the beautiful East Midlands region. Derby can provide visitors with a relaxing holiday full of cultural attractions as well as one overflowing with great restaurants and pulsating bars.

Whether you are visiting for business or simply to see the sights and explore the city, Premier Inn has several well-located hotels in Derby that will ensure your stay is a memorable one.

Derby has a proud manufacturing history but is also packed full of exciting tourist attractions to keep visitors entertained.

Premier Inn's centrally located Derby hotels make getting around the city simple for locals and foreigners alike. One of the most popular attractions guests enjoy visiting is Derby Cathedral, the smallest but one of the most picturesque in England. Our hotels are also close to the Derby Museum and Art Gallery, which displays some of the fascinating objects that have been produced in the city over the centuries.

Premier Inn's hotels in Derby are also excellently located to allow guests to enjoy and explore the bustling Cathedral Quarter and indulge in some of the best cuisine in the Midlands.
